Nashville-Davidson.Woodmont Terrace Apartments:
The Woodmont Terrace Apartments is a historic apartment complex in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.


== Location ==
The buildings are located at 920 Woodmont Boulevard in Nashville, the county seat of Davidson County, Tennessee.


== History ==
Construction of the eleven apartment buildings began in 1938, and it was completed within a year, in 1939. A year later, in 1940, an office building was built adjacent to the residential buildings.
